body.value:
The PCRC is a highly respected research collaborative and the only one of its kind. Our size allows us to facilitate multi-site studies and networking with fellow palliative care investigators. There are many benefits to joining the PCRC.

Chief among them: unparalleled opportunities to share information, collaborate on studies, and engage in science that advances the field of palliative care.

Other benefits include:

  • Member meetings that feature sessions with experts in the field and valuable networking opportunities
  • Investigator Development Center that provides access to clinical trials intensives, webinars, training videos, and other resources
  • The Clinical Studies and Methodology, Measurement, Data Informatics and Statistics, and Caregivers Cores, which provide methodologic expertise about palliative care study design
  • Pilot grants for palliative care studies

By joining the PCRC, you are joining a group of dedicated professionals committed to developing an evidence base to ensure high quality care and optimal well-being for people with serious illness and their caregivers.

Current members who would like to request a change in PCRC membership level can request that this happen by emailing pcrc@ucdenver.edu.

We are no longer accepting applications for PCRC membership.
